StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SP_GENREFERRAL_179]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
declare @ssn varchar(9), @mcriss_ssn varchar(9), @ref_ssn varchar(9), @count int, @person_id int, @ref_person_Id int, @nwa_id int, @ref_nwa_id int, @contract_id int, @ref_contract_id int, @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me
declare referral cursor for select count(p.LAST_NAME), p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, a.REFBY, a.SSN
from mcriss..PERSON c, arms..ARMS179 a le. outer join mcriss..PERSON p on a.REFBY = p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER where a.SSN = c.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER and a.REFBY not like ' %' group by p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, a.REFBY, a.SSN ORDER BY count(P.LAST_NAME)
open referral
fetch referral into @count, @mcriss_ssn, @ref_ssn,@ssn
set @user_login = 'migra.on' set @update_date = getdate()
while (@@fetch_status = 0) begin --This is where we start
IF @count != 0 begin set @person_id = (select PERSON_ID from PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ssn) set @ref_person_id = (select PERSON_ID from PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ref_ssn) set @nwa_id = (select NWA_ID from NWA where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id) set @ref_nwa_id = (select NWA_ID from NWA where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @ref_person_id) set @contract_id = (select CONTRACT_ID from CONTRACT where NWA_ID = @nwa_id) set @ref_contract_id = (select CONTRACT_ID from CONTRACT where NWA_ID = @ref_nwa_id)
if @contract_id is not null begin if @ref_contract_id is not null begin if not exists(select 1 from REFERRAL where CONTRACT_ID = @contract_id and DEP_CONTRACT_ID = @ref_contract_id) begin insert REFERRAL (REFERRAL_TYPE,CONTRACT_ID,DEP_CONTRACT_ID, MARINE_ID,RESERVE_ORG_ID,USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE)
values ('DEP',@contract_id, @ref_contract_id,NULL,NULL,@user_login,@update_date)
print @ssn+'_Added to the REFERRAL TABLE' end--was not in REFERRAL and has now been added
end --ref_contract_id is null else begin print @ref_ssn+'Re.y has not contracted' end
end --contract_id was null else begin print @ssn+'Has not contracted at this point' end
end-- Finished inner loop print @ref_ssn+'_ is not a person in MCRISS\RS'
fetch referral into @count, @mcriss_ssn, @ref_ssn,@ssn
end --all done at this point
close referral deallocate referral
